column5: Ron do you remember about 5 years ago you said i was not allowed to go ice fishing ever again .... well i am thinking about it unless you drop some of those perch you have been catching .... i know you have been catching them cause your nowhere to be found. if you force me i will go ice fishing and you know what that means.... THE WHOLE LAKE WILL SHUT DOWN ... if you guys read this .. belive me it is true.
